frontend.components.form package¶

Submodules¶

frontend.components.form.form module¶

class frontend.components.form.form.Form(**kwargs)¶

Bases: kivymd.uix.card.MDCard

Questionnaire Screen: here all the widgets seen on the questionnaire are initialised. Once an option is modified, it directly sets the filter for the REST-API get request. The search button is simply to switch the screen to the map.

on_start()¶

binds list items to widgets. The function is called once the Form class is initialised.

set_age(text__age)¶

sets the age filter

Parameters

text__age (str)

set_error_message(instance_textfield)¶

checks if the text of a textfield is numerical. If yes the content of the textfield will be relayed to set_guest, if not the textfield will display an error message.

Parameters

instance_textfield (widget)

set_fairfilter(status)¶

sets the fairfilter filter

Parameters

status (bool)

set_guest(n_guests)¶

sets the guests_included filter

Parameters

n_guests (int)

set_highrating(status)¶

sets the highrating filter

Parameters

status (bool)

set_interest(instance_chips)¶

adds/removes interests to a set and updated interest filters

Parameters

instance_chips (widget)

sets the borough filter

Parameters

set_price()¶

sets the price on the range slider.

sets the superhost filter

Parameters

status (bool)

switch_to_mapscreen()¶

sets the price filter and switches to mapscreen
